quest.name: High Standards
journal: Rafold needs a warden to stand watch.
The garrison at Camp Bluefog has need of extra eyes to watch the Garleans to the north. Stand sentry at the three points where the standard of the Immortal Flames flies.
You have stood vigil at the three locations. Return to Rafold and report on your findings.
Rafold is relieved to hear no Garleans were found, but knows the enemy stands poised to strike as soon as the watchman blinks.
objectives: Stand watch at EObj#2002253 and defeat enemies.

dialogue.name: RAFOLD
dialogue.text: As we speak, our garrison prepares to march, leaving the watchtowers undermanned.

dialogue.name: RAFOLD
dialogue.text: Yet we mustn't let the Garleans out of our sight, nor forget we are in theirs. Thus I would ask you to stand sentry, and see to it our flags fly high for all to see.

dialogue.name: RAFOLD
dialogue.text: And so your watch ends. Mayhap you spied only doblyns, but who can say what unseen terrors might have assailed us were you not there to keep watch.

dialogue.name: RAFOLD
dialogue.text: So long as we stand in the shadow of Castrum Meridianum, we must remain ever vigilant.
